com.yolanda.nohttp

类 BasicConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yolanda.nohttp.BasicConnection
  • 直接已知子类:
    DownloadConnection, HttpRestConnection

    public class BasicConnection
extends Object

    Package good Http implementation class, establish connection, read and write data.

    Created in Aug 4, 2015 10:12:38 AM.
    作者:
    Yan Zhenjie.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BasicConnection

        public BasicConnection()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getConnection

        protected Connection getConnection(BasicServerRequest request)
        Send the request, send only head, parameters, such as file information.
        参数:
        request - ImplServerRequest.
        返回:
        HttpResponse.

      • createHttpURLConnection

        protected HttpURLConnection createHttpURLConnection(BasicServerRequest request)
                                             throws IOException,
                                                    URISyntaxException
        The connection is established, including the head and send the request body.
        参数:
        request - BasicServerRequest.
        返回:
        HttpURLConnection Have been established and the server connection, and send the complete data, you can directly determine the response code and read the data.
        抛出:
        IOException - can happen when the connection is established and send data.
        URISyntaxException - url error.

      • getServerStream

        protected InputStream getServerStream(int responseCode,
                                      String contentEncoding,
                                      HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
                               throws IOException
        Get input stream from connection.
        参数:
        responseCode - response code of connection.
        contentEncoding - value of the HTTP response headers.
        urlConnection - connection.
        返回:
        when the normal return the correct input stream, returns the error when the response code is more than 400 input stream.
        抛出:
        IOException - if no InputStream could be created.

      • getInputStream

        protected InputStream getInputStream(String contentEncoding,
                                     HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
                              throws IOException
        Get the input stream, and automatically extract.
        参数:
        contentEncoding - value of the HTTP response headers.
        urlConnection - HttpURLConnection.
        返回:
        http input stream.
        抛出:
        IOException - Unpack the stream may be thrown, or if no input stream could be created.

      • getErrorStream

        protected InputStream getErrorStream(String contentEncoding,
                                     HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
                              throws IOException
        Get the wrong input stream, and automatically extract.
        参数:
        contentEncoding - value of the HTTP response headers.
        urlConnection - HttpURLConnection.
        返回:
        http error stream.
        抛出:
        IOException - Unpack the stream may be thrown.

      • gzipInputStream

        protected InputStream gzipInputStream(String contentEncoding,
                                      InputStream inputStream)
                               throws IOException
        Pressure http input stream.
        参数:
        contentEncoding - value of the HTTP response headers.
        inputStream - InputStream.
        返回:
        It can directly read normal data flow
        抛出:
        IOException - if an IOException occurs.

      • parseResponseHeaders

        protected Headers parseResponseHeaders(URI uri,
                                       int responseCode,
                                       String responseMessage,
                                       Map<String,List<String>> responseHeaders)
        Parse server response headers, here will save cookies.
        参数:
        uri - according to the requested URL generated uris.
        responseCode - responseCode.
        responseMessage - responseMessage.
        responseHeaders - responseHeaders of server.
        返回:
        response headers of server.

      • hasResponseBody

        public static boolean hasResponseBody(RequestMethod requestMethod,
                                      int responseCode)
        This requestMethod and responseCode has responseBody ?
        参数:
        requestMethod - it's come from RequestMethod.
        responseCode - responseCode from server.
        返回:
        true: there is data, false: no data.

      • hasResponseBody

        public static boolean hasResponseBody(int responseCode)
        According to the response code to judge whether there is data.
        参数:
        responseCode - responseCode.
        返回:
        true: there is data, false: no data.

      • hasDownload

        public static boolean hasDownload(RequestMethod requestMethod,
                                  int responseCode)
        This requestMethod and responseCode has responseBody ?
        参数:
        requestMethod - it's come from RequestMethod.
        responseCode - responseCode from server.
        返回:
        true: there is data, false: no data.

      • hasDownload

        public static boolean hasDownload(int responseCode)
        According to the response code to judge whether there is download data.
        参数:
        responseCode - responseCode.
        返回:
        true: there is data, false: no data.
